customInstructions: Always use existing scripts in /storage/napkin and /storage/thebeakers/scripts. Never create new HTML templates - copy existing ones. For explain articles, use /storage/napkin/prompts/explain-story.txt and copy styling from deepdive/legged-locomotion-story.html. For deep dives, copy from deepdive/solar-cell-bromine.html. Use /storage/napkin/src/explain_generator.py to generate explain articles.
